data.name: A Nut For a Jar Of Tuna
data.description:
# Introduction (Definition)

**_Palindrome_** *is a word which* **reads the same backward as forward**, *such as "madam"*. 
___

# Warm-up 

[Is it a Palindrome](https://www.codewars.com/kata/is-it-a-palindrome)
___

# Task

**_Given_** a *Word/string* , **_Return_** *The Palindrome made up from this word* ![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png) 
___

# Notes

* **_Passed Word or String_** is *Under 25 Characters*
![!alt](https://i.imgur.com/mdX8dJP.png) 
____

# Input >> Output Examples:

```cpp
1- plaindrome ("ana") ==> return ("anaana")
```
___

```cpp
2- plaindrome ("dumbmud") ==> return ("dumbmuddumbmud")
```
___

```cpp
3- plaindrome ("campusmottobottomsupmac")  ==> return ("campusmottobottomsupmaccampusmottobottomsupmac") 
```
____
____
___

# [Playing with Numbers Series](https://www.codewars.com/collections/playing-with-numbers)

# [Playing With Lists/Arrays Series](https://www.codewars.com/collections/playing-with-lists-slash-arrays)

___

## ALL translations are welcomed

## Enjoy Learning !!
# Zizou
